questions.multipleCompetitions: Can I manage multiple competitions simultaneously?
questions.accountVerification: How do I verify my account?
questions.inscription: How do I manage competition inscriptions?

multipleCompetitions.answer: Yes, you can manage multiple competitions from your dashboard. Each competition can be configured and managed independently.

accountVerification.intro: Account verification is required to ensure the security and integrity of our competition management system.

step1.title: Check Your Email
step1.description: After registration, check your email inbox for a verification link. Don't forget to check your spam folder.

step2.title: Click the Verification Link
step2.description: Click the verification link in the email. This will take you to a confirmation page.

step3.title: Complete Verification
step3.description: Once the verification is complete, you'll be redirected to your dashboard with full access to all features.

accountVerification.note: If you haven't received the verification email within 5 minutes, you can request a new one from your profile settings.

inscription.intro: Managing competition inscriptions is easy through our platform. Here's everything you need to know about creating, modifying, and deleting inscriptions.

step1.title: Select Competition
step1.description: Navigate to the competition page and click the 'Register' button.

step2.title: Fill in Details
step2.description: Complete the registration form with athlete information and select the desired events.

step3.title: Confirm and Pay
step3.description: Review your inscription details and complete any required payments.

step1.title: Find Your Inscription
step1.description: Go to 'My Inscriptions' in your dashboard and select the one you want to modify.

step2.title: Make Changes
step2.description: Update the necessary information and save your changes. Note that some changes may require additional approval.

delete.title: Canceling an Inscription
delete.description: To cancel an inscription, go to 'My Inscriptions', select the inscription, and click the 'Cancel Registration' button. Follow the prompts to complete the cancellation.
delete.warning: Please note that cancellation policies vary by competition. Some competitions may have deadlines for cancellation or specific refund policies.

cantFindAnswer.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
cantFindAnswer.description: Our support team is here to help! Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
